726852f-a.title: Queens: Hillside Avenue - 118th Street
726852f-a.text:
Hillside Ave., south side, at its intersection with 118th
Street. Its location in 1910 was south of Church Street, at Hill-
side Ave., showing the Richmond Hill station of the Montauk division
of the Long Island Railroad.
About 1910.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
